categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Montrose was a female Sith overseer of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, she was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan.
Overseer Montrose appears as a Sith Inquisitor trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
